body.name: Brick Attic Office Chair, Executive Office Chair Ergonomic Leather Desk Chair with Wheels Swivel Computer Task Chair with Lumbar Support and Flip-up Armrests Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 12 hrs 41 mins
features: [Leather Office Chair] Made of soft and comfortable PU leather and high elastic sponge cushion, excellent sitting sensation. Modern desk chair is stain resistant, wear resistant, waterproof and easy to clean, suitable for meeting room, office and home.

[Multi-Functional] The computer chair has a 120° rocking function and flip-up armrests. User-friendly design and space-saving functionality perfectly combined. 360° rolling desk chair and height adjustment increase comfort and flexibility.

[Ergonomic Office Chair] This comfortable office chair is designed with a 3" thick cushion and a wrap-around cushion and backrest that perfectly contours to your back and hips. Wide desk chair reduces the stress of sitting and helps you work more easily.

[Sturdy and Stable] This task office chair uses a 3-level gas lift, a reinforced steel frame, and a sturdy chassis. Make sure the office chair is stable and durable. Castors move quietly during office hours, not scratching the floor. Max capacity 250lbs.

[Easy Installation] All home office chair hardware and accessories are included in the back zipper. Please refer to the manual and related videos for detailed installation videos. Installation takes about 20 minutes. Please contact us if you have any questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This office chair I bought is a standout choice! Its clean and contemporary look adds a refreshing vibe to my workspace. Comfort takes center stage with its well-cushioned seat and supportive backrest. Adjusting the height is effortless, offering personalized comfort during long work sessions. The chair's mobility is a plus, smoothly gliding on various surfaces. Assembling it was hassle-free, and the sturdy construction assures durability. The white upholstery is not only aesthetically pleasing but also easy to clean. Upgrade your office with this chair – a perfect blend of style, comfort, and practicality. An excellent purchase that elevates both form and function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect office chair
reviews.reviewText: This is a great Comfort chair I even bought. The cushion is so comfortable and soft. The back of the chair gives me a lot of support. The material is very good and strong too. Also it easy to put the parts together. It so worth it for the price. Will buy it again for my kid’s room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Less executive chair; more task chair
reviews.reviewText: THE GOOD: This chair came in a rather compact box opposed to how office chairs typically come packaged. The manufacture accomplished this by storing all of the chair's hardware in the back of the backrest. Unzip the backrest, remove the contents, and zip the backrest back up. Assembly was very easy; directions were very clear; and all the associated hardware conveniently sealed in its own blister on one single flat (see photo). The manufacture was also kind to include some extra screws.THE BAD: With packaging all of the parts and hardware kit in the backrest, there's not much room for padding, and this could be felt when leaning back in the chair - at least for me. The caster wheels are your standard plastic ones so I would recommend upgrading them to the rollerblade type. I have these on other office chairs and they are absolutely amazing. The tilt adjustment was lacking, in my opinion, as it wouldn't allow the front to tilt to accommodate those with shorter legs. The overall size of the chair is smaller than the American version of what an executive chair would look like. This chair is more reminiscent of a task chair.CONCLUSION: Overall, this quality of this chair would be considered average, however the aesthetic, design, and color is exceptional. I only wish the support and ergonomic of the chair were up to the same level as the design. Directions, assembly, and supply of parts were outstanding, and there were no surprises or issues when assembling the chair. Necessary tools were included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brick Attic Office Chair
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Brick Attic Office Chair, and I'm thoroughly impressed.The ergonomic design ensures maximum comfort during long work hours, and the leather finish adds a touch of sophistication to my workspace. The lumbar support is excellent, and the flip-up armrests provide added flexibility. With smooth swivel and easy mobility thanks to the wheels, it's a perfect blend of style and functionality. Highly recommend it to anyone seeking an ergonomic and stylish desk chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fancy and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, put it together least than 30 mins, instruction was clear. Chair is very comfortable. You can adjust the high and armrests can be pull out for easy get out. I like the leather so cleaning will be easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and good price
reviews.reviewText: The chair is very nice and comfortable. Most importantly, it doesn't take up too much space either. I'm quite happy with the price and the quality. It came in a well-protected large box. Overall, it's a great deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous & Comfortable But Quesionable Quality
reviews.reviewText: This Brick Attic leather office chair is very comfortable and looks really nice! I have ordered several office chairs recently on an unwanted quest to find the "perfect" chair for me. My needs: nice appearance, easy rolling wheels, general comfortas well as lumbar support, flip up arm rests and quality.This chair meets most of my needs. Quality and construction are where this chair falls short.Two of the nuts simply wouldn't accept their bolts.With assistance, I was able to make the final product "sturdy enough" even though one bolt wouldn't go in without some shearing. In addition,the spring under the seat cushion is held onto the frame with Gorilla Tape as shown in pics 2 & 3! WHAT!?!Overall, this product is comfortable and looks great! However, I am understandably concerned about its durability and longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST chair on the market!!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is AMAZING. I work a lot and I have to spend a lot of time seated. Most of the previous chairs that I bought have not met my expectations of comfort and I would stand up and my back and butt would be sore. Not with this one though, even after sitting for hours, I would stand up and not be sore. I definitely recommend this chair for people who need a comfortable and supportive chair for work, school, or whatever you want.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfort and Coding: My Experience with the Perfect Programmer's Chair
reviews.reviewText: As a programmer who pretty much lives at my desk, I've got to tell you about this office chair I've recently started using. Honestly, it's been a fantastic find for me.The support this chair offers is spot-on for those of us who spend hours coding. It's got this lumbar support that really helps in keeping my posture right. I've been using it for a while now, and I've really noticed a difference in my back. Less stiffness, less discomfort – it's been a noticeable change for the better.I really appreciate how this chair fits into my workspace. The armrests adjust just right, which is super handy considering I'm switching between different tasks and positions throughout the day. It's all about those little things that make a long day of coding a bit more comfortable, right?Putting it together was surprisingly straightforward. I'm more into lines of code than instruction manuals, but this was hassle-free. Everything I needed was in the box, and I had it set up and ready to go pretty quickly. No fuss, no lost time – that's how I like it.Now, let's talk about comfort – because let's face it, that's key. The seat cushion is solid. It's thick, supportive, and feels like it's made to last. Sitting on it for hours doesn’t feel like a chore, and that’s a big plus for me.The design is another thing I dig. It's got this professional look that just fits right into my home office. And moving around is a breeze with the smooth wheels – I can zip from my desk to my printer and back without any trouble.So, wrapping this up, I'd say this chair has been a solid addition to my programming life. It's all about having that comfortable, supportive spot to tackle my projects, and this chair delivers. If you're coding for hours and need something reliable for your workspace, I'd definitely recommend giving this chair a shot. It's made my workdays noticeably better.

reviews.reviewTitle: A Comfortable Chair That Gets Me Through the Day
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this office chair for a while now, it's a solid chair that gets the job done. The chair was pretty easy to put together and didn’t take long, which was nice because I'm not the handiest person around. I spend most of my day sitting due to the nature of my work, and this chair has made things so much easier. Its very comfortable, what I like about it is that the cushion of the seat itself is very thick and supportive, it feels very high quality when you sit on it and is comfortable when sitting for long hours. The chair is very professional and simple in design and looks great in my home office. The armrests move up and down, so my arms aren't awkwardly pushed up too high or low. Overall, a great ergonomic chair for the price and it has improved my work experience. I would recommend.

I bought it for my kid, it's easy to install, not a big office chair but with comfort with support for back and lumbar, the frame looks strong and move smoothly, fabric on surface and back are all good to a long time's usage, arms can be adjustable easily, and seat can be shape to back around 30 degree that's be great.my kid like it. in general, it's a good office chair.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good design, comfortable and professional look.
reviews.reviewText: I like the solid construction and the overall professional look of this office chair. Setup took some time as I had to carefully set things aside and work slowly on each step. The screws take some time to install using the supplied Allen wrench. Once installed, the chair looks and feels good. I like the professional design and the comfort. This chair has an adjustable headrest but you won’t get the benefit of it if you are a short person. The chair has normal wheels and I wish it had bigger gliding wheels for better floor movement. The back mesh of the chair is strong, hard and comfy. It is s breathable mesh and you can sit for longer periods of time. This is a nice looking chair which is comfortable and a decent deal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to assemble and comfortable chair!!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is exactly what I expected. It is allowing air flow and have a cushioned seat with a curve back that can stretch back and forth to protect my back for prolonged sitting. This chair fits all the conditions, a meshed, curved back rest, that can be pulled back, and a comfortable soft but sturdy seat. Another advantage is we can swirl the chair and adjust the height. Easy to understand the introduction and follow each step. I assembled this chair alone within 15-20 mins. Moreover, it’s easy to clean with the vacuum!! I definitely recommend it to those who need a good economical chair.
